original:
This dragon man Digimon is the result of DNA 
Digivolving ExVeemon and Stingmon. It has dragonic 
strength and a tough insect-like outer shell. It is 
extremely loyal and will protect its Tamer at all costs.
translation:
This dragon man Digimon is the result of DNA 
Digivolving ExVeemon and Stingmon. It has dragonic 
strength and a tough insect-like outer shell. It is 
extremely loyal and will protect its Tamer at all costs.

original:
This dragon man Digimon is the result of DNA
Digivolving Stingmon and ExVeemon. This evolution's
prominent features are more focused on the insect
side, with four wings growing from its back, and
impressive compound eyes, it is able to skillfully
capture prey.
translation:
This dragon man Digimon is the result of DNA
Digivolving Stingmon and ExVeemon. This evolution's
prominent features are more focused on the insect
side, with four wings growing from its back, and
impressive compound eyes, it is able to skillfully
capture prey.

original:
This Digimon's appearance is reminiscent of the
twelve holy beasts of oriental legend. Due to its
ability to freely manipulate its own 'Qi', it is able to
move with incredible flexibility at times, and become
as heavy as iron at others.
translation:
This Digimon's appearance is reminiscent of the
twelve holy beasts of oriental legend. Due to its
ability to freely manipulate its own 'Qi', it is able to
move with incredible flexibility at times, and become
as heavy as iron at others.

original:
This cunning demon beast Digimon takes on the
appearance of the 'Queen of Spiders' from Greek
mythology, and rules over all Dokugumon. It has the
ability to take on a human-like form, which allows it
to lower their prey's guard in order to approach and
devour them.
translation:
This cunning demon beast Digimon takes on the
appearance of the 'Queen of Spiders' from Greek
mythology, and rules over all Dokugumon. It has the
ability to take on a human-like form, which allows it
to lower their prey's guard in order to approach and
devour them.

original:
This undead Digimon is wrapped in bandages like an 
Egyptian mummy. It is known as the 'Necromancer' 
due to its ability to summon and manipulate the residual
data of destroyed Digimon. It is volatile and randomly 
fires its weapon, 'Obelisk', without warning.
translation:
This undead Digimon is wrapped in bandages like an 
Egyptian mummy. It is known as the 'Necromancer' 
due to its ability to summon and manipulate the residual
data of destroyed Digimon. It is volatile and randomly 
fires its weapon, 'Obelisk', without warning.

original:
Going by the nickname 'Great Growlmon', this virus
attribute cyborg Digimon possesses a deep crimson
body, with the top half of its body turning to 'Chrome
Digizoid'. Using the vernier attacked to its shoulders,
it is able to fly about and perform both anti-air and
anti-ground attacks.
translation:
Going by the nickname 'Great Growlmon', this virus
attribute cyborg Digimon possesses a deep crimson
body, with the top half of its body turning to 'Chrome
Digizoid'. Using the vernier attacked to its shoulders,
it is able to fly about and perform both anti-air and
anti-ground attacks.

original:
This cyborg Digimon, known as the 'Keen Hound', 
evolved from Gargomon. It is an excellent hunter and 
uses its fast movements to easily take down enemies.
It shoots homing missiles and uses its large ears like 
radar to find distant enemies.
translation:
This cyborg Digimon, known as the 'Keen Hound', 
evolved from Gargomon. It is an excellent hunter and 
uses its fast movements to easily take down enemies.
It shoots homing missiles and uses its large ears like 
radar to find distant enemies.

original:
This demon man Digimon evolved from Kyubimon and is 
a master of Yin and Yang. It can use various weapons 
and skills and lives in darkness. It has high 
magical abilities and specializes in using incantations 
and talismans to attack. It hides weapons in its 
long sleeves.
translation:
This demon man Digimon evolved from Kyubimon and is 
a master of Yin and Yang. It can use various weapons 
and skills and lives in darkness. It has high 
magical abilities and specializes in using incantations 
and talismans to attack. It hides weapons in its 
long sleeves.

original:
A Giant parrot Digimon that wandered, lost, from
another Digital World through a space-time rift into
this dimension. When it spots an enemy, it swoops
down with its sharp claws, raining lightning down onto
its prey.
translation:
A Giant parrot Digimon that wandered, lost, from
another Digital World through a space-time rift into
this dimension. When it spots an enemy, it swoops
down with its sharp claws, raining lightning down onto
its prey.

original:
Resembling a long-legged spider, this Digimon is able
to penetrate any Network. It is able to assume a
cocoon form by retracting its limbs into its body,
however it can only move in a straight line when it
does this.
translation:
Resembling a long-legged spider, this Digimon is able
to penetrate any Network. It is able to assume a
cocoon form by retracting its limbs into its body,
however it can only move in a straight line when it
does this.

original:
This panda-like Digimon is a rare sight, with a blunt
personality and a lack of charm, it considers itself a
lone-wolf type. Despite its claims, it is secretly
jealous of Monzaemon's popularity. During battle,
it unleashes its true power.
translation:
This panda-like Digimon is a rare sight, with a blunt
personality and a lack of charm, it considers itself a
lone-wolf type. Despite its claims, it is secretly
jealous of Monzaemon's popularity. During battle,
it unleashes its true power.

original:
A demon man Digimon which takes on the form of a
demon crow, it wanders the mountains continuing its
training. It has studied the way of 'Shugendo' and is
able to freely manipulate the power of the gods.
The two swords it holds, the 'Irataka no Ken',
possess a strong curse.
translation:
A demon man Digimon which takes on the form of a
demon crow, it wanders the mountains continuing its
training. It has studied the way of 'Shugendo' and is
able to freely manipulate the power of the gods.
The two swords it holds, the 'Irataka no Ken',
possess a strong curse.

original:
The data hidden within this colossal beast dragon
Digimon's Digicore has been released, and it holds the
alias of the 'Final Enemy'. It's extremely massive
wings to push back enemies with ease, and is able to
crush them with its massive body.
translation:
The data hidden within this colossal beast dragon
Digimon's Digicore has been released, and it holds the
alias of the 'Final Enemy'. It's extremely massive
wings to push back enemies with ease, and is able to
crush them with its massive body.

original:
Possessing deadly fighting instinct and power, this
composite Digimon was formed by combining a wide
variety of Digimon. While it is often said to be a
prototype of Machinedramon, unlike Machinedramon,
it was created using organic parts, not machine
parts.
translation:
Possessing deadly fighting instinct and power, this
composite Digimon was formed by combining a wide
variety of Digimon. While it is often said to be a
prototype of Machinedramon, unlike Machinedramon,
it was created using organic parts, not machine
parts.

original:
This beast man Digimon is the result of DNA
Digivolving Aquillamon and Gatomon. It is capable of
leaping high into the sky, and then using its arms to
glide about freely. Using its radar ears, it is able to
detect enemies, and then transmit information to the
head-mounted display on its head.
translation:
This beast man Digimon is the result of DNA
Digivolving Aquillamon and Gatomon. It is capable of
leaping high into the sky, and then using its arms to
glide about freely. Using its radar ears, it is able to
detect enemies, and then transmit information to the
head-mounted display on its head.

original:
Having Digivolved from the space warrior Starmon,
this mutant Digimon's smugness has gone off the
charts, as it clads itself in flashy outfits and a pair
of sunglasses. It possesses the ability to summon
countless meteors during battle.
translation:
Having Digivolved from the space warrior Starmon,
this mutant Digimon's smugness has gone off the
charts, as it clads itself in flashy outfits and a pair
of sunglasses. It possesses the ability to summon
countless meteors during battle.

original:
Digivolved from Ikkakumon, this Digimon has gained
the ability to walk on two legs, and has tempered its
horn into a sharp saw. In order to protect its well
tempered muscles, it wears the pelts and shells of
defeated enemies. It possesses a special weapon
which is called 'Thor Hammer'.
translation:
Digivolved from Ikkakumon, this Digimon has gained
the ability to walk on two legs, and has tempered its
horn into a sharp saw. In order to protect its well
tempered muscles, it wears the pelts and shells of
defeated enemies. It possesses a special weapon
which is called 'Thor Hammer'.

original:
This mutant Digimon was mutated by living in a harsh
environment. It is extremely small for an Ultimate,
however in comparison to other Ultimates, its power
is absolutely tremendous.
translation:
This mutant Digimon was mutated by living in a harsh
environment. It is extremely small for an Ultimate,
however in comparison to other Ultimates, its power
is absolutely tremendous.

original:
This cyborg Digimon takes the form of a dark dragon. 
It was developed along with Megadramon and is heavily 
armed for mid-air counter attacks. Its special skill, 
'Genocide Gear', involves releasing lasers and missiles 
from both hands.
translation:
This cyborg Digimon takes the form of a dark dragon. 
It was developed along with Megadramon and is heavily 
armed for mid-air counter attacks. Its special skill, 
'Genocide Gear', involves releasing lasers and missiles 
from both hands.

original:
Having mechanized over half of its body, this cyborg
digimon possesses a giant revolver on its right arm,
made from 'Chrome Digizoid', that is able to shoot at
the enemy with extremely powerful force. Despite its
large built, it is surprisingly able to fly through the
sky.
translation:
Having mechanized over half of its body, this cyborg
digimon possesses a giant revolver on its right arm,
made from 'Chrome Digizoid', that is able to shoot at
the enemy with extremely powerful force. Despite its
large built, it is surprisingly able to fly through the
sky.

original:
This cyborg Digimon carries rocket engines on its back,
which allows it to fly through the air using enormous 
propulsive power. Though the duration is limited, 
it is able to momentarily exploit its maximum thrust. 
It  specializes in the 'Hit and Away' style, where it 
attacks the enemy, then quickly moves out of reach.
translation:
This cyborg Digimon carries rocket engines on its back,
which allows it to fly through the air using enormous 
propulsive power. Though the duration is limited, 
it is able to momentarily exploit its maximum thrust. 
It  specializes in the 'Hit and Away' style, where it 
attacks the enemy, then quickly moves out of reach.

original:
Said to be born at the creation of the Digital World,
this holy beast Digimon boasts strength on par with
Mega level Digimon. While it hates to fight, with its
compassionate personality, it will show no mercy to
those who cause trouble.
translation:
Said to be born at the creation of the Digital World,
this holy beast Digimon boasts strength on par with
Mega level Digimon. While it hates to fight, with its
compassionate personality, it will show no mercy to
those who cause trouble.

original:
This fairy Digimon resembles the lilac, a flower that
is beloved by all. Though it is pure, innocent and
beautiful, it is rumored to govern over death and
rebirth.
translation:
This fairy Digimon resembles the lilac, a flower that
is beloved by all. Though it is pure, innocent and
beautiful, it is rumored to govern over death and
rebirth.

original:
An 'Armor Digivolved' form of Wormmon, this Digimon
has had an adverse reaction to the 'DigiEgg of
Courage' and turned wicked. It is able to control the
element of fire, utilizing attacks that involve intense
heat.
translation:
An 'Armor Digivolved' form of Wormmon, this Digimon
has had an adverse reaction to the 'DigiEgg of
Courage' and turned wicked. It is able to control the
element of fire, utilizing attacks that involve intense
heat.

original:
This martial artist Digimon is a bloodsucking dancer
said to have been born from a museum's folk dance 
database. It excels in dance and uses its fluttering 
garment to distract opponents before slicing them 
with hidden rapiers.
translation:
This martial artist Digimon is a bloodsucking dancer
said to have been born from a museum's folk dance 
database. It excels in dance and uses its fluttering 
garment to distract opponents before slicing them 
with hidden rapiers.

original:
This plant Digimon evolved from Woodmon and has 
gained extreme intelligence and power. Known as the 
'Lord of the Deep Forest', it lures lost Digimon deeper
into the forest until they are unable to escape. It 
creates fog and uses its branch-like tentacles and 
ivy to capture prey.
translation:
This plant Digimon evolved from Woodmon and has 
gained extreme intelligence and power. Known as the 
'Lord of the Deep Forest', it lures lost Digimon deeper
into the forest until they are unable to escape. It 
creates fog and uses its branch-like tentacles and 
ivy to capture prey.

original:
This Ultimate level Demon Lord Digimon possesses
qualities of by the divine, and the diabolic. This
current form, known as 'Falldown Mode', befell upon
the once angelic Lucemon after becoming a Fallen
Angel. It has a desire to destroy this world, and
rebuild it anew.
translation:
This Ultimate level Demon Lord Digimon possesses
qualities of by the divine, and the diabolic. This
current form, known as 'Falldown Mode', befell upon
the once angelic Lucemon after becoming a Fallen
Angel. It has a desire to destroy this world, and
rebuild it anew.

original:
This tiny mutant dragon Digimon wears a helmet upon
its head. It is often referred to as the 'Tiny Tyrant'
due to it fearlessly and relentlessly attacking any
Digimon that dares enter its territory.
translation:
This tiny mutant dragon Digimon wears a helmet upon
its head. It is often referred to as the 'Tiny Tyrant'
due to it fearlessly and relentlessly attacking any
Digimon that dares enter its territory.

original:
While this alien Digimon may appear to have come from
a distant cosmos, it is actually rumored to have been
born from the seed of a plant. Despite its
underwhelming appearance, it hides terrifying
offensive power.
translation:
While this alien Digimon may appear to have come from
a distant cosmos, it is actually rumored to have been
born from the seed of a plant. Despite its
underwhelming appearance, it hides terrifying
offensive power.

original:
This cyborg Digimon remodeled its entire body in
order to strengthen itself, gaining intimidating
offensive power and the ability to withstand
powerful attacks. It fires missiles from its right arm,
lasers from its left, and smashes through armor
using its sturdy chin.
translation:
This cyborg Digimon remodeled its entire body in
order to strengthen itself, gaining intimidating
offensive power and the ability to withstand
powerful attacks. It fires missiles from its right arm,
lasers from its left, and smashes through armor
using its sturdy chin.

original:
This mysterious puppet Digimon hides within a cute
Tyrannomon-shaped plush doll. Its power and
defense rival that of Monzaemon, however, if there
is nothing pulling its strings, then the doll becomes
nothing but a decoration.
translation:
This mysterious puppet Digimon hides within a cute
Tyrannomon-shaped plush doll. Its power and
defense rival that of Monzaemon, however, if there
is nothing pulling its strings, then the doll becomes
nothing but a decoration.

original:
This reaper-like ghost Digimon carries around a
gigantic sickle and chain, and it is said that once
possessed by Phantomon, there is no hope for
survival. Rumor has it, underneath the cloth draped
over its body is a portal that leads to a Digital World
of a different dimension.
translation:
This reaper-like ghost Digimon carries around a
gigantic sickle and chain, and it is said that once
possessed by Phantomon, there is no hope for
survival. Rumor has it, underneath the cloth draped
over its body is a portal that leads to a Digital World
of a different dimension.

original:
Only Veedramon that have survived countless battles
are able to achieve this holy dragon Digivolution.
Due to its past experience, its strength and defense
have grown considerable, and it has evolved wings
that allow it to fly through the sky.
translation:
Only Veedramon that have survived countless battles
are able to achieve this holy dragon Digivolution.
Due to its past experience, its strength and defense
have grown considerable, and it has evolved wings
that allow it to fly through the sky.

original:
The Ultimate stage of Leomon, this beast man Digimon
has equipped its arms and legs with high speed
rotating armor. It has mastered secret skills
that allow it to use these turbines to overwhelm
opponents with powerful attacks.
translation:
The Ultimate stage of Leomon, this beast man Digimon
has equipped its arms and legs with high speed
rotating armor. It has mastered secret skills
that allow it to use these turbines to overwhelm
opponents with powerful attacks.

original:
This heavy-weight warrior Digimon covers its body in
armor made from 'Chrome Digizoid', and easily wields
its beloved Greatsword. It's said that it wears its
heavy armor in order to suppress its uncontrollable
power. It is loyal to its master, regardless of their
moral standing.
translation:
This heavy-weight warrior Digimon covers its body in
armor made from 'Chrome Digizoid', and easily wields
its beloved Greatsword. It's said that it wears its
heavy armor in order to suppress its uncontrollable
power. It is loyal to its master, regardless of their
moral standing.

original:
With its long neck, this dragon Digimon resembles a
dinosaur from ancient times. Despite its large, heavy
body, its personality is quiet, and it is quite
carefree.
translation:
With its long neck, this dragon Digimon resembles a
dinosaur from ancient times. Despite its large, heavy
body, its personality is quiet, and it is quite
carefree.

original:
A Gatomon that has 'Armor Digivolved' using the
power of the 'Digi-Egg of Courage', this Digimon takes
on the appearance of a lynx shrouded in blazing hot fur.
It is known to inhabit tropical jungles, and possesses 
a stubborn personality, refusing to listen to others.
translation:
A Gatomon that has 'Armor Digivolved' using the
power of the 'Digi-Egg of Courage', this Digimon takes
on the appearance of a lynx shrouded in blazing hot fur.
It is known to inhabit tropical jungles, and possesses 
a stubborn personality, refusing to listen to others.

original:
This turtle-like demon man Digimon was banished from
the heavens of the Digital World. While it is generally
cool and collected, if even a single bead is lost from
its Digicore necklace, it will transform once again into
a ferocious Digimon.
translation:
This turtle-like demon man Digimon was banished from
the heavens of the Digital World. While it is generally
cool and collected, if even a single bead is lost from
its Digicore necklace, it will transform once again into
a ferocious Digimon.

original:
Taking on the appearance of a crow with three legs,
this Digimon is able to produce holy energy from the
Vajra located on both of its wings. It is rumored that
this Digimon will guide the chosen to the 'Golden Land'
of the Digital World.
translation:
Taking on the appearance of a crow with three legs,
this Digimon is able to produce holy energy from the
Vajra located on both of its wings. It is rumored that
this Digimon will guide the chosen to the 'Golden Land'
of the Digital World.

original:
The Ultimate form of Firamon, it has evolved to
become well suited for combat, able to stand on two
legs. Its special move, 'Crimson Beast King Wave'
consists of concentrating flames and the spirit of a
lion into its fist, and then firing the energy wave in
the shape of a lion.
translation:
The Ultimate form of Firamon, it has evolved to
become well suited for combat, able to stand on two
legs. Its special move, 'Crimson Beast King Wave'
consists of concentrating flames and the spirit of a
lion into its fist, and then firing the energy wave in
the shape of a lion.

original:
The Ultimate form of Lekismon, it is able to move with
extreme speed. It carries its specialized weapon,
'Nova Luna' in both hands, and during battle, it
dances around beautifully, quickly slicing up the
enemy. This skill is known as 'Lunatic Dance'.
translation:
The Ultimate form of Lekismon, it is able to move with
extreme speed. It carries its specialized weapon,
'Nova Luna' in both hands, and during battle, it
dances around beautifully, quickly slicing up the
enemy. This skill is known as 'Lunatic Dance'.

original:
This member of the 13 'Royal Knights' is an ‘Armor
Digivolved’ form of Veemon Digivolved using the
'Digi-Egg of Miracles'. It is said to be able to
overcome any challenge with the power of Miracles,
and boasts sturdy 'Chrome Digizoid' armor and
tremendous defensive ability.
translation:
This member of the 13 'Royal Knights' is an ‘Armor
Digivolved’ form of Veemon Digivolved using the
'Digi-Egg of Miracles'. It is said to be able to
overcome any challenge with the power of Miracles,
and boasts sturdy 'Chrome Digizoid' armor and
tremendous defensive ability.

original:
A Patamon 'Armor Digivolved' using the power of the
'Digi-Egg of Kindness', it is able to dig underground at
an incredible speed. When threatened, it will swiftly
dig a hole in order to escape.
translation:
A Patamon 'Armor Digivolved' using the power of the
'Digi-Egg of Kindness', it is able to dig underground at
an incredible speed. When threatened, it will swiftly
dig a hole in order to escape.

original:
A Hawkmon 'Armor Digivolved' using the power of the
'Digi-Egg of Sincerity', this Digimon has the ability to
blend in with nature and attacks the enemy from its
blind spot like a ninja. Both of its arms are
spring-like and able to extend.
translation:
A Hawkmon 'Armor Digivolved' using the power of the
'Digi-Egg of Sincerity', this Digimon has the ability to
blend in with nature and attacks the enemy from its
blind spot like a ninja. Both of its arms are
spring-like and able to extend.

original:
An Armadillomon 'Armor Digivolved' using the power of
the 'Digi-Egg of Friendship', it is a heavy machinery
Digimon capable of construction work whose right
hand is a forklift, and left a shovel.
translation:
An Armadillomon 'Armor Digivolved' using the power of
the 'Digi-Egg of Friendship', it is a heavy machinery
Digimon capable of construction work whose right
hand is a forklift, and left a shovel.

original:
Generated from a bug in the algorithm, this Digimon
possesses countless tendrils that are capable of
controlling a vast field. Whenever it takes control of
something, it transforms into a parasite called 'Worm
Phase'.
translation:
Generated from a bug in the algorithm, this Digimon
possesses countless tendrils that are capable of
controlling a vast field. Whenever it takes control of
something, it transforms into a parasite called 'Worm
Phase'.

original:
The 'DNA Digivolution' of Angemon and Ankylomon,
this Digimon prides itself on its superior defensive
capabilities. It's believed that it is a descendant of
an angel Digimon from Ancient Times. It can rotate its
neck and torso 360 degrees, allowing it to attack
any direction.
translation:
The 'DNA Digivolution' of Angemon and Ankylomon,
this Digimon prides itself on its superior defensive
capabilities. It's believed that it is a descendant of
an angel Digimon from Ancient Times. It can rotate its
neck and torso 360 degrees, allowing it to attack
any direction.

original:
A Seadramon that has Digivolved to control the power
of darkness, it uses its blade-like horn on its head
to attack fiercy. It is a sly Digimon who's tenacity in
catching prey exceeds that of MegaSeadramon.
translation:
A Seadramon that has Digivolved to control the power
of darkness, it uses its blade-like horn on its head
to attack fiercy. It is a sly Digimon who's tenacity in
catching prey exceeds that of MegaSeadramon.

original:
This undead Digimon was restored from fossil data.
The cold black vapors that flow from its DigiCore are
said to engulf any Digimon into pure terror. It's
special skill is called 'Grave Bone'.
translation:
This undead Digimon was restored from fossil data.
The cold black vapors that flow from its DigiCore are
said to engulf any Digimon into pure terror. It's
special skill is called 'Grave Bone'.

original:
This warrior Digimon wields a pair of swords, and was
given the nickname of 'Golden Meteor'. It's royal blue
mantle is proof of the honor bestowed upon it for its
achievements in countless battles, and its sword
skills surpass even the Royal Knight,
Crusadermon's skills.
translation:
This warrior Digimon wields a pair of swords, and was
given the nickname of 'Golden Meteor'. It's royal blue
mantle is proof of the honor bestowed upon it for its
achievements in countless battles, and its sword
skills surpass even the Royal Knight,
Crusadermon's skills.

original:
Only Tyrannomon that have overcome countless
fierce battles can achieve this form. Acting
according to its title of 'Master', it adopts
Tyrannomon and trains them to become full-fledged
warriors.
translation:
Only Tyrannomon that have overcome countless
fierce battles can achieve this form. Acting
according to its title of 'Master', it adopts
Tyrannomon and trains them to become full-fledged
warriors.

original:
This mysterious Digimon is rumored to be in the same
family as the demon man Digimon, Piedmon. It is able
to appear anywhere in time and space using its Book.
translation:
This mysterious Digimon is rumored to be in the same
family as the demon man Digimon, Piedmon. It is able
to appear anywhere in time and space using its Book.

original:
With the appearance of a mythical Mermaid, this
Digimon is particularly skilled at singing. It is,
however, a greedy Digimon with a weakness for
treasure, and it tends to steal the data of other
Digimon.
translation:
With the appearance of a mythical Mermaid, this
Digimon is particularly skilled at singing. It is,
however, a greedy Digimon with a weakness for
treasure, and it tends to steal the data of other
Digimon.

original:
Taking on the form of a military commander, this
Digivolution of Buraimon draws upon countless life
experiences to mow down enemies with enough force
to crush mountains to dust. The stronger it grows,
and the more it destroys, the more it feels empty
inside.
translation:
Taking on the form of a military commander, this
Digivolution of Buraimon draws upon countless life
experiences to mow down enemies with enough force
to crush mountains to dust. The stronger it grows,
and the more it destroys, the more it feels empty
inside.

original:
This Mega level insect Dgiimon has evolved using the
data of both Kabuterimon and Kuwagamon. It flies
around the Digital World at the speed of sound,
possesses a gigantic horn and mandibles, and is said
to perfectly compensate for the weaknesses of
both Kabuterimon and Kuwagamon.
translation:
This Mega level insect Dgiimon has evolved using the
data of both Kabuterimon and Kuwagamon. It flies
around the Digital World at the speed of sound,
possesses a gigantic horn and mandibles, and is said
to perfectly compensate for the weaknesses of
both Kabuterimon and Kuwagamon.

original:
This ancient lion Digimon is said to be the beast form,
and ancestor of Leomon, though the details are
shrouded in mystery. It is capable of moving at mach
speed.
translation:
This ancient lion Digimon is said to be the beast form,
and ancestor of Leomon, though the details are
shrouded in mystery. It is capable of moving at mach
speed.

original:
This rare fairy Digimon inhabits the Net Ocean and
dislikes fighting. It wears a mystical 'Holy Ring'
around its neck, which is thought to have some sort
of connection with holy Digimon.
translation:
This rare fairy Digimon inhabits the Net Ocean and
dislikes fighting. It wears a mystical 'Holy Ring'
around its neck, which is thought to have some sort
of connection with holy Digimon.

original:
Given the nickname 'Assault Landing Ship', this
Digimon is even bigger in size than Whamon, and is
also capable of transporting Digimon within its body.
It is equipped with tremendous power matching its
massive size.
translation:
Given the nickname 'Assault Landing Ship', this
Digimon is even bigger in size than Whamon, and is
also capable of transporting Digimon within its body.
It is equipped with tremendous power matching its
massive size.

original:
This elusive demon man Digimon takes on the form of
a clown, much about it is shrouded in mystery. It
possesses incredible power, and if you happen to
come across it, you'll have no choice but to curse
your fate.
translation:
This elusive demon man Digimon takes on the form of
a clown, much about it is shrouded in mystery. It
possesses incredible power, and if you happen to
come across it, you'll have no choice but to curse
your fate.

original:
A demon lord Digimon that leads the many Devil and
Fallen Angel Digimon. It was originally a high-ranking
Angel Digimon, however it rebelled against Good and
was banished to the Dark Area. Because of this,
it bares a great grudge towards those who are good.
translation:
A demon lord Digimon that leads the many Devil and
Fallen Angel Digimon. It was originally a high-ranking
Angel Digimon, however it rebelled against Good and
was banished to the Dark Area. Because of this,
it bares a great grudge towards those who are good.

original:
This Mega level holy bird Digimon possesses four
shining golden wings. It is the leader of all bird
Digimon, and is said to preside over all holy Digimon.
translation:
This Mega level holy bird Digimon possesses four
shining golden wings. It is the leader of all bird
Digimon, and is said to preside over all holy Digimon.

original:
This Puppet Digimon was created from the body of a
cursed Cherrymon. Despite taking on the appearance
of a marionette, it is able to move freely. It is a
massive liar with a detestable personality, and
whenever a computer presents false information,
it is more than likely to be the work of Puppetmon.
translation:
This Puppet Digimon was created from the body of a
cursed Cherrymon. Despite taking on the appearance
of a marionette, it is able to move freely. It is a
massive liar with a detestable personality, and
whenever a computer presents false information,
it is more than likely to be the work of Puppetmon.

original:
Given the nickname the 'Queen of Flowers', this fairy
Digimon resembles a rose, and greatly values beauty.
It wears a 'Tiferet' around its neck which is said to
promise eternal beauty and power.
translation:
Given the nickname the 'Queen of Flowers', this fairy
Digimon resembles a rose, and greatly values beauty.
It wears a 'Tiferet' around its neck which is said to
promise eternal beauty and power.

original:
This Digimon's body is covered in 'Chrome Digizoid' 
armor. It is a dragon warrior with a lot of battle 
experience, and has improved its speed and power. 
It carries 'Dramon Killer' weapons on both hands and 
a 'Brave Shield' on its back.
translation:
This Digimon's body is covered in 'Chrome Digizoid' 
armor. It is a dragon warrior with a lot of battle 
experience, and has improved its speed and power. 
It carries 'Dramon Killer' weapons on both hands and 
a 'Brave Shield' on its back.

original:
This Digimon exchanged its speed for power by
metalizing its entire body. It uses the four 'Laser
Sights' on the tip of its nose to lock onto targets,
and is able to release beam-shaped wings from the
arms on its back that allow it to fly. It hides a large
amount of weapons inside its cyborg body.
translation:
This Digimon exchanged its speed for power by
metalizing its entire body. It uses the four 'Laser
Sights' on the tip of its nose to lock onto targets,
and is able to release beam-shaped wings from the
arms on its back that allow it to fly. It hides a large
amount of weapons inside its cyborg body.

original:
Created using various parts from many different
cyborg Digimon, this Fullmetal Digimon boasts
overwhelming power and intelligence. However,
someone, or something, planted an evil program into
its Digicore, causing it to lose its free will and be
supplied with infinite malice-filled power.
translation:
Created using various parts from many different
cyborg Digimon, this Fullmetal Digimon boasts
overwhelming power and intelligence. However,
someone, or something, planted an evil program into
its Digicore, causing it to lose its free will and be
supplied with infinite malice-filled power.

original:
Having unleashed the true power of Myotismon, this
beast man Digimon has a tough over body, and a
beast-like lower body. Myotismon, being elegant and
refined, hates exposing this omnicidal and ugly side
that thinks of nothing but destruction.
translation:
Having unleashed the true power of Myotismon, this
beast man Digimon has a tough over body, and a
beast-like lower body. Myotismon, being elegant and
refined, hates exposing this omnicidal and ugly side
that thinks of nothing but destruction.

original:
This Mega level dragon Digimon has existed since 
ancient times and is difficult to control due to its 
immense power. Depending on how it is raised, it can 
become good or evil. This form is called 'Dragon Mode'
and there is said to be another form, 'Fighter Mode', 
that unleashes all of its power.
translation:
This Mega level dragon Digimon has existed since 
ancient times and is difficult to control due to its 
immense power. Depending on how it is raised, it can 
become good or evil. This form is called 'Dragon Mode'
and there is said to be another form, 'Fighter Mode', 
that unleashes all of its power.

original:
This Digimon was originally a high-ranking Angel but fell 
to the Dark Area and became a demon lord. While evil, 
it doesn't often do evil deeds and maintains a position 
of neutrality. It is said that it will transform into a 
god of destruction at the final battle.
translation:
This Digimon was originally a high-ranking Angel but fell 
to the Dark Area and became a demon lord. While evil, 
it doesn't often do evil deeds and maintains a position 
of neutrality. It is said that it will transform into a 
god of destruction at the final battle.

original:
This Seraph Digimon possesses ten golden wings,
and is clad in holy armor. It rules over all angel
Digimon, and together with Ophanimon and Cherubimon
Virtue, they're known as the Three Great Angels.
translation:
This Seraph Digimon possesses ten golden wings,
and is clad in holy armor. It rules over all angel
Digimon, and together with Ophanimon and Cherubimon
Virtue, they're known as the Three Great Angels.

original:
This cyborg Digimon was created by perfecting the
incomplete Andromon by increasing its 'Chrome
Digizoid' parts. Due to this, it has now gained free
will, and its attacks against virus Digimon are
fearfully intense.
translation:
This cyborg Digimon was created by perfecting the
incomplete Andromon by increasing its 'Chrome
Digizoid' parts. Due to this, it has now gained free
will, and its attacks against virus Digimon are
fearfully intense.

original:
Said to have Dark-Digivolved from Digitamamon, this
mutant Digimon is thought to be similar to 'Pandora's
Box', filled with all the evils of the Digital World.
It is able to cast destructive magic by reciting
ancient high-level programming language.
translation:
Said to have Dark-Digivolved from Digitamamon, this
mutant Digimon is thought to be similar to 'Pandora's
Box', filled with all the evils of the Digital World.
It is able to cast destructive magic by reciting
ancient high-level programming language.

original:
With the appearance of a beast, this angel Digimon's
mighty lightning strikes are thought to be divine
punishment. Together with Ophanimon and
Seraphimon, they're known as the Three Great
Angels.
translation:
With the appearance of a beast, this angel Digimon's
mighty lightning strikes are thought to be divine
punishment. Together with Ophanimon and
Seraphimon, they're known as the Three Great
Angels.

original:
Once part of the Three Great Angels, this Digimon
was turned evil by a virus, and became Cherubimon
Vice. Its lightning strikes are thought to be divine
punishment.
translation:
Once part of the Three Great Angels, this Digimon
was turned evil by a virus, and became Cherubimon
Vice. Its lightning strikes are thought to be divine
punishment.

original:
As the highest ranking of the Royal Knight of Network
Security, this Virus Digimon protects the Net. 
However, if balance is lost, it becomes a dangerous 
being. It wears 'Chrome Digizoid' armor and wields 
the holy lance 'Gram' in its right hand and the holy 
shield 'Aegis' in its left.
translation:
As the highest ranking of the Royal Knight of Network
Security, this Virus Digimon protects the Net. 
However, if balance is lost, it becomes a dangerous 
being. It wears 'Chrome Digizoid' armor and wields 
the holy lance 'Gram' in its right hand and the holy 
shield 'Aegis' in its left.

original:
This colossal machine Digimon's entire body has
become nothing but a mass of weapons, and as such,
it is able to counter an attack from any direction.
Due to this, its speed is extremely slow, however,
because it has focused so heavily on power, it
possesses unbelievable destructive force.
translation:
This colossal machine Digimon's entire body has
become nothing but a mass of weapons, and as such,
it is able to counter an attack from any direction.
Due to this, its speed is extremely slow, however,
because it has focused so heavily on power, it
possesses unbelievable destructive force.

original:
This priestess Digimon conveys the will of the gods 
and fights with the power of Yin and Yang. It can 
dispel evil spirits and create mystic barriers. When 
performing rituals, it transforms into a priestess. It 
carries four pipes containing Pipe Foxes, which are 
used for attacking and gathering information.
translation:
This priestess Digimon conveys the will of the gods 
and fights with the power of Yin and Yang. It can 
dispel evil spirits and create mystic barriers. When 
performing rituals, it transforms into a priestess. It 
carries four pipes containing Pipe Foxes, which are 
used for attacking and gathering information.

original:
Given the nickname 'Demon' this Digimon runs rampant
across the Network, absorbing data in order to grow
stronger and larger. This envoy of destruction's
ultimate goal is to hijack a military computer and use
it to launch nuclear missiles in order to destroy the
Human World.
translation:
Given the nickname 'Demon' this Digimon runs rampant
across the Network, absorbing data in order to grow
stronger and larger. This envoy of destruction's
ultimate goal is to hijack a military computer and use
it to launch nuclear missiles in order to destroy the
Human World.

original:
The ruler of all aquatic Digimon, this Digimon wears
scalemail made from 'Blue Digizoid'. It has incredible
agility and uses its massive spear to unleash
tremendous destructive power.
translation:
The ruler of all aquatic Digimon, this Digimon wears
scalemail made from 'Blue Digizoid'. It has incredible
agility and uses its massive spear to unleash
tremendous destructive power.

original:
This Digimon was born from a mutated computer virus
created by a hacker. Though it is small, this Digimon
has a rebellious personality and is constantly picking
fights regardless of the opponent's strength. It
wears a helmet on its head made from 'Chrome
Digizoid'.
translation:
This Digimon was born from a mutated computer virus
created by a hacker. Though it is small, this Digimon
has a rebellious personality and is constantly picking
fights regardless of the opponent's strength. It
wears a helmet on its head made from 'Chrome
Digizoid'.

original:
Once believed to be imaginary, this long-necked
Digimon was discovered within the computer of a
cryptozoology research institute. It is rarely seen,
often only making an appearance on foggy days,
and as it cries out, anyone who hears its cries will be
wrapped in icy sorrow.
translation:
Once believed to be imaginary, this long-necked
Digimon was discovered within the computer of a
cryptozoology research institute. It is rarely seen,
often only making an appearance on foggy days,
and as it cries out, anyone who hears its cries will be
wrapped in icy sorrow.

original:
This cyborg Digimon was constructed around the
same time as Andromon. Due to using humans as a
base, this Digimon has acquired emotions, and it's
also quite powerful. However, it once lost control of
its emotions and caused an accident, and in
response, its memories were erased.
translation:
This cyborg Digimon was constructed around the
same time as Andromon. Due to using humans as a
base, this Digimon has acquired emotions, and it's
also quite powerful. However, it once lost control of
its emotions and caused an accident, and in
response, its memories were erased.

original:
Known as 'Prince of the Mamemon world', this
extremely gorgeous mutant Digimon has taken in
royal data. Wearing a crown and cape made from the
records of the royal family, this Digimon simply
cannot wipe the smile from its face.
translation:
Known as 'Prince of the Mamemon world', this
extremely gorgeous mutant Digimon has taken in
royal data. Wearing a crown and cape made from the
records of the royal family, this Digimon simply
cannot wipe the smile from its face.

original:
Said to be the embodiment of the merciful side of
God, this Mega level orphan Digimon is the final stage
of feminine angel Digimon. Together with Cherubimon
Virtue and Seraphimon, they're known as the Three
Great Angels.
translation:
Said to be the embodiment of the merciful side of
God, this Mega level orphan Digimon is the final stage
of feminine angel Digimon. Together with Cherubimon
Virtue and Seraphimon, they're known as the Three
Great Angels.

original:
This demon man Digimon acts as general of the 
Musyamon corps and moves easily on the battlefield 
due to its fused horse lower half. This allows it to 
swing its giant sword, 'Ryuzanmaru', without losing
balance.
translation:
This demon man Digimon acts as general of the 
Musyamon corps and moves easily on the battlefield 
due to its fused horse lower half. This allows it to 
swing its giant sword, 'Ryuzanmaru', without losing
balance.

original:
This ancient elder Digimon is thought to have existed
since the creation of the Digital World. It is said to
have infinite knowledge of the Digital World, and once
guided the chosen humans when the world fell into
crisis.
translation:
This ancient elder Digimon is thought to have existed
since the creation of the Digital World. It is said to
have infinite knowledge of the Digital World, and once
guided the chosen humans when the world fell into
crisis.

original:
With the appearance of an old woman, this ancient
Digimon is rumored to have once been a Rosemon that
fell victim to a curse. However, it is unknown if this
rumor is actually true, as it has never been verified.
It uses the broom it carries in its right hand to erase
viruses with ease.
translation:
With the appearance of an old woman, this ancient
Digimon is rumored to have once been a Rosemon that
fell victim to a curse. However, it is unknown if this
rumor is actually true, as it has never been verified.
It uses the broom it carries in its right hand to erase
viruses with ease.

original:
This god man Digimon is often called the 
'Digimon Judge' and constantly surveys the Dark Area.
It can turn the data of fallen Digimon into DigiEggs, but 
if the data is evil, it will imprison it in darkness. It can 
also summon a demonic beast from Hell.
translation:
This god man Digimon is often called the 
'Digimon Judge' and constantly surveys the Dark Area.
It can turn the data of fallen Digimon into DigiEggs, but 
if the data is evil, it will imprison it in darkness. It can 
also summon a demonic beast from Hell.

original:
Taking on the appearance of a one-eyed spider,
this parasite Digimon is able to take control of
whichever Digimon it chooses to leech off of. Once it
attaches itself to a host, this Digimon is able to draw
out the hosts full power, however this causes it to
become extremely aggressive.
translation:
Taking on the appearance of a one-eyed spider,
this parasite Digimon is able to take control of
whichever Digimon it chooses to leech off of. Once it
attaches itself to a host, this Digimon is able to draw
out the hosts full power, however this causes it to
become extremely aggressive.

original:
Commanding the army of angels, this angel Digimon
cuts through the vanguard in battle. Its entire body
has been turned into sharp blades that it uses to
fiercely slice the enemy to pieces. While it is part of
the angel family, it is a being that heavily specializes
in offensive power.
translation:
Commanding the army of angels, this angel Digimon
cuts through the vanguard in battle. Its entire body
has been turned into sharp blades that it uses to
fiercely slice the enemy to pieces. While it is part of
the angel family, it is a being that heavily specializes
in offensive power.

original:
This giant bird Digimon's entire body is clad in golden
armor which is made from 'Chrome Digizoid'. It is said
that it's duty is to annihilate the invaders that enter
the Digital World.
translation:
This giant bird Digimon's entire body is clad in golden
armor which is made from 'Chrome Digizoid'. It is said
that it's duty is to annihilate the invaders that enter
the Digital World.

original:
Once thought imaginary, this Digimon was born from
the 'Daydream of a Digicore'. It is the embodiment of
massive 'destruction', the incarnation of the 'Ultimate
Enemy', and no ordinary Tamer could even hope of
handling a Digimon of this caliber.
translation:
Once thought imaginary, this Digimon was born from
the 'Daydream of a Digicore'. It is the embodiment of
massive 'destruction', the incarnation of the 'Ultimate
Enemy', and no ordinary Tamer could even hope of
handling a Digimon of this caliber.

original:
More of a lone wolf, this demon lord Digimon prefers
to live and act independently. Wielding its two
cherished shotguns, 'Berenjena', this Digimon is
extremely prideful and dislikes preying on the weak.
translation:
More of a lone wolf, this demon lord Digimon prefers
to live and act independently. Wielding its two
cherished shotguns, 'Berenjena', this Digimon is
extremely prideful and dislikes preying on the weak.

original:
This beast man Digimon lives faithfully to the idea of
'Justice' that it believes in. It is said that only
Digimon that have survived countless battles with
high level Digimon are able to acquire the title of
'Bancho', so long as their spirits aren't broken by
that point.
translation:
This beast man Digimon lives faithfully to the idea of
'Justice' that it believes in. It is said that only
Digimon that have survived countless battles with
high level Digimon are able to acquire the title of
'Bancho', so long as their spirits aren't broken by
that point.

original:
Believed to be the last resort weapon for the
mechanized 'D-Brigade', this cyborg Digimon wields
strong dark powers. It is rumored to be wandering
the world, hunting 'Codename: BAN-TYO'. It is
equipped with the 'Gigastick Lance' in its right hand.
translation:
Believed to be the last resort weapon for the
mechanized 'D-Brigade', this cyborg Digimon wields
strong dark powers. It is rumored to be wandering
the world, hunting 'Codename: BAN-TYO'. It is
equipped with the 'Gigastick Lance' in its right hand.

original:
This Digimon was artificially created from a Vademon
that was analyzed and improved upon. It seems it was
built using extraterrestrial technology from a certain
country's facility known as 'Area 51'.
translation:
This Digimon was artificially created from a Vademon
that was analyzed and improved upon. It seems it was
built using extraterrestrial technology from a certain
country's facility known as 'Area 51'.

original:
With a shining golden body, this holy dragon Digimon
conceals a dragon Digimon in each hand, which
releases a mysterious life force. Its special
skill, called 'God Flame', involves exploding it's
holy spirit to instantly mow down opponents in every
direction.
translation:
With a shining golden body, this holy dragon Digimon
conceals a dragon Digimon in each hand, which
releases a mysterious life force. Its special
skill, called 'God Flame', involves exploding it's
holy spirit to instantly mow down opponents in every
direction.

original:
A Mega level form of Seadramon species, this
Digimon's entire body is clad in 'Chrome Digizoid' that
is able to reflect any normal attack. On top of that,
it boasts the fastest speed amongst all aquatic
Digimon.
translation:
A Mega level form of Seadramon species, this
Digimon's entire body is clad in 'Chrome Digizoid' that
is able to reflect any normal attack. On top of that,
it boasts the fastest speed amongst all aquatic
Digimon.

original:
This warrior Digimon clad in pure white is able to move
faster than the eye can see. It carries with it 'Fenrir
Sword', which is able to freeze any opponent that it
slashes. It is accompanied by a golden bird called
'Freyja', which alerts it to danger.
translation:
This warrior Digimon clad in pure white is able to move
faster than the eye can see. It carries with it 'Fenrir
Sword', which is able to freeze any opponent that it
slashes. It is accompanied by a golden bird called
'Freyja', which alerts it to danger.

original:
Weaping a red muffler that flows in the wind, this
'Hero of Justice' type Digimon is a hero to young
Digimon everywhere. It is known to Digivolve from
Cyberdramon, and won't stand for evildoers.
translation:
Weaping a red muffler that flows in the wind, this
'Hero of Justice' type Digimon is a hero to young
Digimon everywhere. It is known to Digivolve from
Cyberdramon, and won't stand for evildoers.
